Literature Review: Self-continuity is a multifaceted concept that has garnered significant attention in recent years, with researchers exploring its various forms, motivational character, regulatory properties, and consequences for psychological and physical health. This literature review aims to provide an overview of the current state of knowledge on self-continuity, highlighting its psychological and behavioral benefits, as well as its neural correlates and cultural variations.
